plan.plan_title: Bomb Threat Call at Orion Mall

steps.details: Police intelligence to validate call, check CCTV, and cross-reference with any other alerts.
Dispatch EOD unit to conduct systematic sweep and render-safe procedures.
Initiate stepwise evacuation from food court outward to minimize panic and maintain order.
Move evacuees to pre-designated safe zones and account for vulnerable persons.
Provide clear instructions to avoid rumors and manage ingress to nearby areas.
Simultaneously evacuate mall and adjacent Rajajinagar metro station to reduce secondary hazards.
Block adjacent roads to create secure perimeters and guide evacuees to safe dispersal zones.
Assign teams to assist elderly, children, and disabled in evacuations.
Secure CCTV and access logs for investigation and maintain chain-of-custody for evidence.
Provide authoritative updates once sweep concludes to prevent misinformation.

plan.plan_title: Service Suspension on Green Line (Rajajinagar Segment)

steps.details: Operate trains to bypass Rajajinagar until clearance; update timetables and passenger notices.
Arrange shuttle buses between adjacent stations and inform passengers of boarding points.
Ensure metro staff assist EOD teams with station access and CCTV footage retrieval.
Deploy staff to manage queueing at alternate stations and prevent overcrowding.
Inspect station systems before reopening and run gradual resumption of services.
